title: FPS Skipping
body: Hi there! So I have I5 Intel Core, 16gb ram, 250 SSD, 1TB (Extra) HD, GeForce NVIDIA 970, 144hz Monitor. I recently deleted everything off of my PC and started from scratch. I don't know why but I'm having major issues with LOL only.. I can run other games like Overwatch or CSGO perfectly fine, but league constantly gives me problems. I've done the Trouble Shooting on the support website and still nothing. Someone Please helpppppp! {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
Some recent Windows 10 updates rolled out that upgraded some Xbox Game integrations and enabled Game DVR, which has caused some FPS problems for some players. I recommend either [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) or game DVR to see if it changes anything.

Let me know if you have any questions.
